title: Handshake Medium Light Skin Tone No Skin Tone

adjectives: A symbol of mutual understanding and agreement.
verbs: To seal a deal, confirm a partnership, or express goodwill.
nouns: Represents a pact, a connection, or a friendly gesture.

description: Represents agreement, deal-making, or a friendly greeting between two people. The medium-light skin tone indicates a specific variation.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the handshake emoji with a medium-light skin tone showcases two hands meeting in a gesture of agreement and unity, rendered with Apple‚Äôs characteristic realistic lighting and subtle depth. The smooth, slightly rounded edges of the hands convey a sense of trust and professionalism, while the subtle shading adds to its tactile appeal. This emoji is ideal for signifying pacts, collaborations, or a positive resolution, embodying a spirit of cooperation as seen on Apple devices.
